Text:
I can't find the movie anywhere, just the soundtrack.  :-/  

If anyone has a copy of the movie, either upload it or let me know, please.  Thanks.

Haven't seen the movie floating around much on torrent anywhere - looks like Sumo had an .avi torrent of it added a while back, but it looks like it's zeroed out in terms of seeds/leeches.

Worse comes to workse, a quick check at Amazon.com has a DVD version of it marked "used" for less than five bucks...
